subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Drury had two of his team’s three rare power-play goals and finished his hat trick with a short-handed tally, as the Rangers beat the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning for the third time this season.
snippet: Chris Drury had two of his team’s three rare power-play goals and finished his hat trick with a short-handed tally, as the Rangers beat the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning for the third time this season.
